snippet.title: Dead In Vinland - OFFICIAL RELEASE TRAILER
snippet.description:
NOW AVAILABLE ON STEAM ORIGIN & GOG!
Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/573120/Dead_In_Vinland/
Origin: https://www.origin.com/fra/en-us/store/dead-in-vinland/dead-in-vinland/standard-edition
Gog: https://www.gog.com/game/dead_in_vinland

DEAD IN VINLAND is a survival/management indie game with RPG and adventure elements, and is the sequel of DEAD IN BERMUDA.

Exiled on a faraway, unknown land, lead Eirik and his family on their quest to survive.

More informations:

Official website: http://deadinvinland.com/
Facebook: http://facebook.com/deadingames/
Twitter: http://twitter.com/deadingames/
Discord: https://discord.gg/uFdNKqs
Instagram: http://instagram.com/deadinvinland/
